TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute>. For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml).
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. In .NET Framework 4, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly. For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml).
## WPF Usage Notes <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> is an example WPF class where this attribute is applied.

Docs.related: XAML-related CLR attributes for custom types and libraries
